description: This is a collection of different colorful 1 x 1 pixel Inscriptions in GIF format. This simple, smallest pixel, which keeps moving, represents a strong intention to continue to grow endlessly, changing from this starting point into any digital art form. The flashing graphics and single pixel are also a tribute to world-renowned crypto artists XCOPY and Pak.
